QuestData.Title: More than a Pound of Flesh
QuestData.Description: $n, I've got something else for you to do. One of the eggheads wants to study the fiendling flesh beasts that can be found at Razaan's Landing, north of the Razor Ridge.$B$BMore to the point, they want to study the flesh of the flesh beasts that are there.$B$B<Dizzy makes a disgusted face.>$B$BBut, of course, they aren't willing to get their hands dirty, and they only want the ether-energized flesh, which it's not likely that all of them have.$B$BI say, beggars can't be choosers, but what can you do?
QuestData.CompletionText: You have my pound of flesh? What, you didn't think that was funny?
QuestData.RewardText: These ought to do nicely. Don't they stink, though?$B$BI hope that this is worth your troubles... I'm just glad that it was you collecting this stuff instead of me!
